Subject: Re: Redhot, Long Haul, Domnijoe, & Blindchaos
References: <9nea7l+k80v@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Soundwave ignored Long Haul, and looked long and hard at Megatron, his
ruby eyes not hinting at all what he was up to. Secretly however, he was
forcing his communication systems to delve into Megatron, and read his
brain waves. He saw the attack on Autobot city in the year 2005, he saw
the devastating battle between Optimus and Megatron, saw the
transformation at the hands of Unicron, then the events from a different
distorted perspective, until a light. 

"It is Megatron." Soundwave hummed. "I am sure of it."

Rumble looked up, confused.
